implementation_output.changes_summary: Implemented three batch tool functions (async_batch_read, async_batch_write, async_batch_update) that delegate to single-file tools. Each batch function processes files sequentially, collects per-file results, and returns a summary with total/succeeded/failed/contention counts. Created comprehensive test suites covering success, partial failure, contention, and encoding scenarios. Updated tools/__init__.py to export new batch functions.
